description: Converts an anatomical dataset from DICOM files into a volume, specifically designed to fit in line with other processing such as DTI analysis.

dicom_directory.title: DICOM Directory
dicom_directory.description: Input as DICOM directory; DIR_IN should contain only DICOM files; all will be selected.

nifti_input.title: NIFTI Input
nifti_input.description: Input as NIFTI file (zipped or unzipped fine). Alternative to '-indir ..'.

prefix.title: Prefix
prefix.description: Set prefix (and path) for output data.

workdir.title: Working Directory
workdir.description: Specify a working directory, which can be removed (default name = '__WORKING_convert_dcm_anat').

orient.title: Orientation
orient.description: Optional chance to reset orientation of the volume files (default is currently 'RAI').

reorig_reorient_off.title: Reorient/Reorigin Off Flag
reorig_reorient_off.description: Turns off the nicety of putting (0, 0, 0) at brain's center of mass (-> 'reorigin' calc) and reorienting data (-> 'reorient' calc).

qc_prefix.title: QC Prefix
qc_prefix.description: Set the prefix of the QC image files separately (default is '').

no_cmd_out.title: No Command Output Flag
no_cmd_out.description: Don't save the command line call and the location where it was run.

no_qc_view.title: No QC View Flag
no_qc_view.description: Turn off generating QC image files.
